title: [Large-Scale] Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA)-Based Medical Education Design: Applying the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and general understanding of rural healthcare settings
context.additional_context: Learning the PRA methodology using digital devices and executing field application projects.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize PRA tools (mapping, matrix scoring, seasonal calendars) to analyze rural community health issues.
Learners can design and implement PRA-based educational programs according to the ADDIE model phases.
Learners can collect and analyze PRA data in the field using digital devices (tablets, survey apps) and compile the results into reports.

resources: Collaborative System with Local Health Centers

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
